vulnerability.name: USN-4230-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4230-1 fixed a vulnerability in ClamAV. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that ClamAV incorrectly handled certain MIME messages. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause ClamAV to crash,  resulting in a denial of service.

statements.status_notes: ClamAV could be made to crash if it opened a specially crafted file. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
